plot: Host Patrick Van Horn visits the Walt Disney Studios for a backstage look at the making of the live-action version of Rudyard Kipling's "The Jungle Book."
title: The Making of Rudyard Kipling's 'The Jungle Book'
plot_es: Host Patrick Van Horn visits the Walt Disney Studios for a backstage look at the making of the live-action version of Rudyard Kipling's "The Jungle Book."
original_name: The Making of Rudyard Kipling's 'The Jungle Book'
